ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode: def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") from Benner.ERP.Comum import Utils widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = widget.Entity == None and Utils.VerificaPermissao("MANTERFORNECEDOR", "MANTER_CLIENTES", "MODULO_COMERCIAL", "MODULO_FINANCEIRO", "MODULO_TRIBUTOS", "MODULO_CONTRATOS") widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = Utils.VerificaPermissao("MANTERFORNECEDOR", "MANTER_CLIENTES", "MODULO_COMERCIAL", "MODULO_FINANCEIRO", "MODULO_TRIBUTOS", "MODULO_CONTRATOS")
